name: MOB GLITCH
description:
The time has come! You must kill all members of the syndicate.  But be aware, you only have as many bullets as there are mobs!

* If you think that the game is too difficult that is because it was done so in purpose. There is a special glitch that you should use to ease your challenge.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse - Shoot

Esc - Menu

Authors:

Alisher Khalmuratov - Art / Animation / Level Design

Darkhan Zholmukhanov - Programming / UI / Effects
